name: Brick Game Car Game by GAWANIMYD
name_original: Brick Game Car Game by GAWANIMYD
description:
Brick Game Car Game by "GAWANIMYD" was our just for Fun game. We just want to remake our Childhood game originated from the old game console "Brick Game". Lets beat each other High Score.

Controls: 

A/D or Left/Right arrow key to move Left or Right.

 Space bar to Turbo

So have fun and Enjoy.....
